title: Setsuna’s Worries
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Hm…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Is something worrying you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Recently when I have free time, I’ve been thinking... How could I make a more impactful entrance at our performances?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Huh... So you’re saying that what you’ve been doing won’t work?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Making an entrance that’ll leave an impact on the audience is important! If you’ve ever watched them, scenes where the hero of justice appears leave a big impact every time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Then why don’t you make an entrance like those heroes of justice, Setsuna?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Y-you’re right!! You’re totally right, Mia-san! I’ll just think of a way to appear like a hero at our next live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Nice. So that solves it then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>No, not yet! The hero’s entrance scene always has some cool background music to go with it! Mia-chan, could you make me some cool background music!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>H-huh!? ...But you know, that might be kinda fun. Alright, I’ll be sure to make you the coolest entrance music!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
